name: Simply Dodge (Samet Hope)
description:
What is this?

This is a game, duh.

    Jokes aside, 'Simply Dodge' is a very simple game where there are objects coming your way and you must dodge them by moving. The longer you survive, harder the game gets and higher the score you get when you lose. 

    This game is not meant to be an full fledged release game or anything in that matter,  but rather a basic project for myself to see and learn the proccess of designing, making, polishing and publishing a game from scratch. 
   However it is of course a fully completed game and playable. I may or may not update and add/change features in future.

How To Play
  • Mobile
    Swipe horizontally and vertically to move.
  • Desktop
    Use the `wasd` or direction keys on the keyboard to move.
Avaliable Platforms
  • Android 
  • Windows
  • Linux
  • Mac
  • Browser
